divs: Sighting Details About 9:35 I was sitting outside with four others and I was facing the south. The next thing I noticed was a light single engine plane with four landing lights on. These lights alternated in a rapid pattern, very unusual. I could see the landand lights from the back. I was looking east and there was an intense which stayed on 4-5 seconds. As soon as it disappeared another one appeared two miles further to the east. This stayed on 4-5 seconds. The single engine plane came back to the area as if searching. This was at the east of Goldwater Range.
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Yuma
There was one other sighting in Yuma on or around March 23rd 2010
Summary: Intense bright white light with blue hue stationary in sky
